dashboard.title: Data Quality Dashboard
dashboard.description: Comprehensive data quality metrics across all data layers

targets.sql: SELECT date_trunc('day', dwh_create_date) as date, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM bronze.crm_cust_info GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 DESC LIMIT 30
SELECT date_trunc('day', dwh_create_date) as date, COUNT(*) as record_count FROM silver.crm_cust_info GROUP BY 1 ORDER BY 1 DESC LIMIT 30
SELECT COUNT(*) as null_customer_ids FROM bronze.crm_cust_info WHERE cst_id IS NULL
SELECT COUNT(*) as negative_sales FROM silver.crm_sales_details WHERE sls_sales < 0

SELECT (1 - (COUNT(*) / (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM gold.fct_sales))) * 100 as integrity_score FROM gold.fct_sales fs LEFT JOIN gold.dim_customers dc ON fs.customer_key = dc.customer_key WHERE dc.customer_key IS NULL
